main event: A circular-shaped object with a yellowish light was spotted at high altitude in Queens, New York City, moving at a speed slightly slower than a jet aircraft.
interesting points: The object initially moved at a slow speed, then sped up and climbed in altitude.
The object briefly closed in on a flight of fighter aircraft, then moved off rapidly at a speed of around 500 mph.
The object was reported to the cockpits of other aircraft at 12:45.
The pilot who observed the object could not identify it, but described it as a 'flying saucer-like shape'.
The sighting lasted an unknown duration, but was reported to have occurred between 12:45 and 14:33.
sighted object: circular-shaped object with a yellowish light
